title: About Us
text: PlanUMBC was created as a group project by undergraduates at UMBC.

section.title: Why was it made?
section.content: This website was developed as main project for CMSC 447 during the Fall 2023 semester. It was designed with the intent to help students quickly and intuitively design a class plan for UMBC before registering for classes.

section.title: Who created it?
section.content: The creators were Zachary Margulies, Alan Valdez, Amir Hawkins-Stewart, Rodolfo Argueta-Rios, and Brandon Price all under the guidance of professor Samit Shivadekar and TA Jayalakshmi Mangalagiri.
